question.title: Scene Builder 23.0.1 and custom controls not loading from javafx
question.body:
I'm updating an old java 8 program to java 21. I've set up my new system and most controls seem fine in scene builder except the Custom controls that appear to be from the javafx library. In my case its the CheckBoxCombo, CheckListView, and StatusBar.

On my old system using SceneBuilder I found these under Custom as in:

In my updated java 21 system I've moved up to SceneBuilder 23.0.1. These are not present so I thought I had to add them via library manager. I browse to the javafx 21 lib folder and add in the jar files but nothing is found to be added.

These aren't custom controls I'm creating - just trying to load in the javafx sdk 21 controls but its not finding anything to add.

Am I missing some config setting or something? How do I get these to load into SceneBuilder? Do I have the wrong version of SceneBuilder?

question_comments.body: As you are migrating from Java 8 to a later version, also see: Using ControlsFX with JDK 9 and above

Thanks for the info - I just see fx (whatever) and think its all one big library.   I think I've got the latest and put back in the StatusBar so I'm assuming I'm on the right path and can add back in the others as well.

Your assumption is correct. But those custom controls you were using before were never part of standard JavaFX. You must have added ControlsFX (a third-party library) to your old Scene Builder and have just forgotten that you did. And you should add the latest version of ControlsFX which is 11.2.2 as of this comment.

I guess I was under the assumption the old javafx with java8 was just pulled out and is the same controls as in the javafx 21 sdk.   Sounds like its not.  I'm not too worried about the StatusBar and I think I would work around the CheckListView but the CheckComboBox might be trickier if I can't find a way (or other lib) that has a similar control.   All I'm trying to do is get this up and running on 21 with minimal effort at this point.    Can I just add in the controlsfx version 8 to scene builder?   Seems like I'd end up with some sort of conflict but I'll give it a shot.

The CheckComboBox, CheckListView, and StatusBar controls are not standard JavaFX controls. In other words, they're not controls from the javafx.controls module. If I'm not mistaken, they're from the ControlsFX library. Have you added that library to your new version of Scene Builder?
